summary: A VA employee accidentally pasted patient information when replying to Sprint notification for discount of her personal cell phone account. The email exchange took place on the employee's VA computer. She states that when she typed in "I Agree", patient information was pasted into the message and sent to Sprint's "NVPCustReply@sprint.com" address. The employee notified the Information Security Officer (ISO) who in turn contacted the Privacy Officer (PO) for follow-up.   The information erroneously transmitted included the patient's name, address, full SSN, and date of birth.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
